cause.description:
The Jewish Council for Public Affairs (JCPA) is deeply concerned about the crisis in Sudan. For years we have worked with our coaltion partners, including the American Jewish World Service, to call attention to the plight and suffering of the Darfurians.
Come Join our effort and advocate for a stronger US and UN response to this ongoing genocide. We will post rescources here and we encourage you to use them to organize your community. This is a great way to show show your commitment to a world without the horrors of genocide. Join this group and pass along the information to all of your friends.
JCPA has been a leader on this issue. We are members of the Executive Committee of the Save Darfur Coaltion and work tirelessly with our national member agencies (14) and local member agencies (125) around the country
1. Increased UN Peacekeepers in Darfur
2. Pressure on China to end support of Sudan
3. Increased attention to this issue by the international community
4. Full implementation of Sanctions on Sudan
cause.name: JCPA WORKS TO END GENOCIDE IN DARFUR
